name: Dwarflin
description:
Join us in an amazing islands world of dwarfs, goblins, drakes and kobolts! An adventure RPG where you play as a dwarf fighting and drinking your way through enemies using his powerful axe to demolish enemies with his amazing abilities. He can hit, smash and even burp his away from enemies! Now the bastard goblins have created a massive storm, putting the dwarfs at a miss. 

Now, as a young dwarf, your job is to kill everyone in your way and destroy these powerful totems, on each of the six islands, which represent each level of the game. (edited)
